analytic.title: Demons Gone Wild: An Introduction, and Translation of the Syriac Qenneshre Fragment

biblStruct.note: The Syriac Qenneshre Fragment preserves a set of colorful tales concerning how the Miaphysite monks of Qenneshre reacted to their monastery's infestation by demons. The convoluted and occasionally humorous accounts found in this possibly eighth-century text include extended polemics against Judaism, early Islam, and competing branches of Christianity. A new edition and first English translation of the text attempts to make this work more accessible and emphasizes the importance of hagiographic material for our understanding of ancient Syriac Christianity.
